Darkfate's troops/Darkfate::

Several troops of Darkfate were arriving to see what's going on. 
Darkfate felt the tention in the Black Fortress.  His four snakes 
were ready and hissing around the body of their master.

"Of course that Megaton, won't have by now any intention to fight" 
said the dragon "it's not wise annoy a Dragon in his own lair... " he 
added "What are those important news Megaton?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Darkmouse::
> 
> Darkmouse smiles at Megaton, knowing that DrillBit would support 
her 
> now. She waits for the Megatron-clone to respond to DrillBit.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> > ::DrillBit::
> > 
> > "No. this guy isn't going to push my team around, in our own base.
> > Get to the point, Megaton! If you want to continue to beat around 
> the
> > bush, then go take a swim in the lava! Now tell us what you came 
to
> > tell."
> > He calmed himself, and his tone with the last sentance.
> > He would stand up for his troops. They were family to him. Megaton
> > wasn't going to come into their home, and push them around.
